title: Sorting algorithms/Cocktail sort

solutions.name: script

description: The cocktail sort is an improvement on the Bubble Sort. Given an array of numbers, the cocktail sort will traverse the array from start to finish, moving the largest number to the end. Then, it will traverse the array backwards and move the smallest number to the start. It repeats these two passes, moving the next largest/smallest number to its correct position in the array until it is sorted.
instructions: Write a function that sorts a given array using cocktail sort.
